column1: Dropped by @JubileeSouth today to drop off my contribution and make my annual donation of toiletries from my pandemic-limited travels. Coronavirus has impacted the homeless and food-insecure more than ever before. We all need to pull together to take care of one another. https://t.co/Fm8CtNMbYR

There is no time to waste when it comes to #COVID relief yet the GOP continues their deadly tactics of delay and denial. Republicans need to accept the facts acknowledge the crisis and immediately come to the table to work on COVID relief. https://t.co/6MBcYSTGHI

Recent news is promising but it will be months before average Americans can access any #COVID vaccine. Having EVERYONE wear a mask when out in public is still our best bet of keeping the virus at bay while we ramp up vaccine production and availability. https://t.co/FH8mHBNdtW

While we work to address the public health crisis caused by COVID-19 we must not forget that guns remain a leading cause of premature death in United States. Congress must do everything possible to reduce gun violence and these deaths of despair.   https://t.co/FZcyCzAl5B

#COVID reveals an uneasy truth about U.S. culture: mothers remain the fallback plan. Moms have borne the brunt of the pandemic. Addressing their needs and sacrifices is central to any recovery. https://t.co/yIt1hKXbdE

The latest #COVID vaccine news from Moderna is promising but even the rosiest forecasts say it will be several months before it's available to the public. We need to keep wearing masks social distancing and practicing good hygiene to help slow the spread.https://t.co/T4ziDpx9MK

Friday marked the 4th day of record high #COVID infections in the US. We need all Americans to wear masks in public to have any hope of keeping deaths down and avoiding a dark winter.  https://t.co/nDDMXZUTk0

DeSantis’ decision to hire a #COVID conspiracy theorist to help run FL’s virus response is like hiring a flat earther to run NASA. It’s an objectively stupid decision that puts all of us at risk. https://t.co/qjhnhJ3njk

Florida’s #COVID cases are rising statewide and our hospitals are reaching capacity. If we want any hope of avoiding a dark winter we need to listen to experts wear our masks social distance and do everything else necessary to slow the spread.  https://t.co/So8MYaCYK4

Tremendous promising news! But it'll take months to approve ensure its safety and disburse a vaccine widely. So please keep wearing a mask wash your hands and social distance. We’re losing 1000+ Americans a day to COVID-19. We can’t let it get worse.  https://t.co/J8hrOXF3Rm

South Florida schools have already seen hundreds of #COVID cases just weeks after resuming in-person classes. If we want children and teachers back in classrooms safely we need to aggressively increase testing & reporting and make sure our schools aren’t superspreader sites. https://t.co/o81zcweMdZ

McConnell and the @GOP have given up on addressing the #COVID crisis. After cramming through a #SCOTUS judge while millions cast votes the Senate adjourned until after the election dimming any hope of a relief bill or stimulus for American families.  https://t.co/b3LFIEMcsz

You can draw a direct line from @GovRonDeSantis’ foolhardy decision to reopen FL and the current spike in #COVID cases. This is what happens when the Governor puts politics over science.  https://t.co/N7aWTyg99y

4 out of 5 people who left the workforce in Sept. were women. We can’t let Trump’s failed #COVID response erase decades of growth for women. We need real solutions for the 'she-session' brought on by the pandemic like the ones the House passed in the #HEROESAct. #MomsBailout

Cases are rising nationwide and 220k are dead so what is this president doing? Bashing Fauci for daring to tell the truth about #COVID. This is not a plan. #ListenToTheScientists https://t.co/2JY8QEGeiO

Early voting has officially begun in Broward & Miami-Dade! All polling places are set up for safe socially distant voting and you can even drop off your mail-in ballots without entering the buildings. Find your nearest poll and vote today! https://t.co/o7OdrkksEv

#COVID is fueling the housing crisis and millions of Americans now face eviction.   #KnowYourRights as a tenant. Find out if you qualify for protection from eviction.   Visit https://t.co/DaFNqlGmip for more information. https://t.co/Bq1aAzHFTf
Stunning @SunSentinel reporting makes clear: @GovRonDeSantis and his top officials routinely obfuscate FLA #COVID positively rates to accelerate our reopening.   https://t.co/RgIyU4jWk4

COVID cases are rising across 40 states and forecasts show a looming second wave. We cannot force Americans to endure this without relief. The Senate needs to stop the #SCOTUS hearings and pass the #HeroesAct today. https://t.co/i3cXwK9hNP

The Senate should be voting on #COVID relief and stimulus checks today. Instead they’re cramming through a #SCOTUS justice who can swiftly take pre-existing health care protections away. Americans deserve better.  https://t.co/3bNNGgcQ6H

Today’s @POTUS #COVID news shows us that the pandemic is far from over. Struggling workers and businesses need the #HeroesAct more than ever. We can’t afford to wait any longer. https://t.co/7CKQ1URBZW
I hope Trump & @FLOTUS have a full #COVID recovery. Wearing a mask avoiding crowds and listening to health experts is vital for everyone.  https://t.co/nsLhdB2mnz
Today we surpassed 200k confirmed #Coronavirus deaths. You have to wonder: how many could have been saved if Trump was honest about what he knew months ago? #FamiliesFirst https://t.co/Lu9EZ0nNu0

McConnell is laser focused on cramming another ideologue for a lifetime seat on the #SCOTUS.   What he’s ignoring:   -COVID Relief -Gov’t funding -Unemployment Insurance -Relief for small businesses  https://t.co/5vBkJ950zT

.@GovRonDeSantis would rather scare up bogeymen around Florida’s overwhelmingly peaceful protests than address his inept management of the #COVID crisis. 200K Americans are dead millions have no job and too many in FL have paltry UI or lack health care. This is not leadership. https://t.co/7lQi8xfjw0

.@HouseDemocrats are delivering #ForThePeople but @SenateMajLdr is standing in the way. As #COVID threatens the lives & livelihoods of people across the the stakes are higher than ever. https://t.co/FPg4w4gJGm

Pregnant workers should not have to fear losing their job their paycheck or their healthcare as they prepare to bring a new life into the world especially in the era of #COVID. I’m proud to have joined my colleagues in passing the #LongOverdue Pregnant Workers Fairness Act. https://t.co/bFfSxMpmPZ

Today marks the start of #HispanicHeritageMonth. This month we honor Latino and Hispanic Americans’ contributions to our nation throughout history. Amid #COVID Latinos are proving themselves more essential than ever and resilient in the face of adversity. #HHM https://t.co/soBcBaqAL7

As we remember those we lost in the September 11th attacks let’s also honor the brave first responders and frontline workers who ran into the chaos and heroically serve in the era of coronavirus. Thank you for your sacrifice. https://t.co/2yJC8sU6HC
How many deaths could have been prevented if Trump had actually been honest about the danger posed by #COVID? #TrumpKnew https://t.co/PiR4tD5RS7

While we wait on a #COVID vaccine the #FluShot is already available. Do your part to stop the spread and keep our hospitals focused on fighting coronavirus. Get your flu shot today! https://t.co/vX4JRpwhCw
Another day of rising #COVID cases. Keep wearing your masks keep washing your hands and keep flattening the curve. We aren’t through this storm yet. https://t.co/e9hqlrbZPJ
I’m LIVE on Facebook with public health experts to answer all of your #COVID questions. Tune in now👇 https://t.co/bufc4Epjzn

Florida has already seen its first school closure due to #COVID. If @GovRonDeSantis doesn't back down and concede that schools are risky environments we will continue to see more schools shuttered and families forced to come up with last-minute childcare. https://t.co/t0fdnoH602

For 100+ days Republicans have sat on their hands and blocked critical coronavirus relief telling Americans to ‘just pause.’ The @GOP needs to put Americans over politics and pass the #HeroesAct now. https://t.co/n2pRkPXu0H

In just two weeks nearly 100K children have contracted #COVID nationwide. Children aren't immune and they aren't safe despite @GovRonDeSantis push that they return to school in person in the coming weeks. https://t.co/Gy8Z4D6rEb

The climate crisis is fueling more intense storms which damage health care infrastructure in coastal communities. Compounded with COVID vulnerable communities will be disproportionately hurt unless we start taxing carbon and finally transition to clean energy. https://t.co/kFsHhXjNDH

.@GovRonDeSantis has turned FL’s eviction moratorium into a ‘pay-to-play’ system. Nobody should be forced to go to court and prove COVID has affected them while also looking for a job and trying to live on our state’s stingy unemployment benefits. https://t.co/PA2FuUTUQM
When you go out make sure you #BeSMARTFL S: Social distance! M: Mask up! A: Avoid crowds! R: Remember to wash hands! T: Throw away non-reusable masks! https://t.co/ZwMgqNgVfB

The FL Dept of Health urges all Floridians to answer calls from (833) 917-2880 as this is part of Florida's comprehensive contact tracing effort. If you receive a call from this number it's important that you speak with a contact tracer regarding potential #COVID19 exposure.

COVID has devastated child care forcing closures and exacerbating the shortage of quality affordable care providers. I'm proud to put my support behind legislation that provides relief for families and providers and supports the safe reopening our economy. #SaveChildCare https://t.co/ttVciLREmv

The @GOP’s new COVID proposal includes backdoor funding for Trump’s racist wall. I’m not sure what weapons systems that were raided by Trump for the wall have to do with COVID. How about we focus on testing contact tracing & helping our frontline workers? https://t.co/1lLwuD1p2x

COVID has become a “category five emergency” for Florida nursing homes: cases are up 153% in ten days. Those who look after our seniors deserve better testing federal PPE aid and real leadership from @GovRonDeSantis. https://t.co/ffmRpQ9mL1

80K+ new COVID cases in a single week a new record for FLA but @GovRonDeSantis STILL won’t even issue a mask mandate. How many more Floridians must get sick or die before he acts? https://t.co/DfZuyO0eaS

Nurses keep our health systems running but #COVID is creating a deadly shortage in healthy trained Florida nurses. These are the real world strains and obstacles @GovRonDeSantis continues to ignore with his rushed reopening. https://t.co/DZCpMxZe4e

Florida now has more new #COVID cases per capita than any other state. @GovRonDeSantis can’t keep sitting on his hands. If he doesn’t want to act he shouldn’t be in the governor’s mansion. https://t.co/cxBs4QMDfS
We needed a mask mandate and a stricter reopening a month ago before this surge in #coronavirus cases across Florida happened. Now they are a matter of life and death. https://t.co/e9RGOQqEsn

#COVID has shown the deplorable state @SenRickScott left our unemployment system in and how terribly @GovRonDeSantis is managing it now. It’s been 4 months since this all started & some Floridians are still waiting for benefits what’s taking so long? https://t.co/3Orba5rIbx

Grilling fireworks open water and now #coronavirus make Independence Day ripe for injuries. When you celebrate this weekend follow the health experts’ advice wear a mask and leave fireworks to the professionals. Have a safe holiday! https://t.co/Pkhe7jQMOg

When people say COVID doesn’t affect kids they’re wrong. 7000+ kids have tested positive in Florida alone. It’s our job as parents to keep our children safe and make sure they wear a mask when in public. https://t.co/ZHya0cSwMs

In the first half of 2020 245 prescription drugs had an average price increase of more than 20%. Making matters worse? 3-in-4 of these Rxs are directly related to fighting COVID-19. You deserve #LowerCostsForCare! https://t.co/3pGbS7VzKA

The same week Florida reported 43784 new COVID cases Trump and the GOP asked SCOTUS to strike down the #ACA & its protections for pre-existing conditions. Ripping health care away from Americans amid a pandemic. Talk about misplaced priorities. https://t.co/vTria719NW
With each day @GovRonDeSantis refuses to issue a mask mandate he is allowing #coronavirus to needlessly spread across Florida. This is dangerous.  https://t.co/jw9SJi8xi2

Yet again local officials are filling the leadership vacuum left by @GovRonDeSantis. Mask mandates save lives but until we have them statewide Florida will continue to see COVID surge as other states recover. https://t.co/RBw1s1bFih

When you look at the statistics it becomes clear who #COVID19 is hitting the hardest: people of color poor people elderly people. Now more than ever we need to build on the success of the #ACA to expand health care coverage and drive down costs. https://t.co/ohmFWGD6Me

It’s sad that when faced with a truly nonpartisan threat like #coronavirus @GovRonDeSantis continually misleads the public erroneously blaming minorities & testing for our meteoric rise. Shameful consequential and dangerous. We deserve better than this. https://t.co/aRp7ZNyNOm
.@GovRonDeSantis has failed to lead. Now COVID-19 cases are surging in FL. Do your part to keep yourself and your community healthy: wear a mask and wash your hands.  https://t.co/UTQb3sZ5Ia
If you’re out in public do your part and wear a mask to slow the spread of #coronavirus.   https://t.co/t5vJsuVbax

Tonight I am hosting a webinar on managing breast cancer during COVID-19. Please join me and a panel of experts at 6:30pm as we discuss our own breast cancer stories and how to navigate care and resources during the pandemic. RSVP NOW: https://t.co/YsNhHH5eiM

Congress was promised publication of full data on the impact of COVID on America’s nursing homes & assisted living facilities by the end of May. Well it’s June 1 and we still don’t have it. How can we accurately equip & assist  seniors if this @GOP admin won’t even give us facts? https://t.co/PF5bcZt3Tf

Today I’ll question @SecWilkie about (among other things) @DeptVetAffairs’ COVID-19 response and the Nazi graves in VA cemeteries. It’s our first ever hybrid in-person/remote hearing and you can watch it LIVE on YouTube! https://t.co/zoSpfVN4XD

The PPP was a bipartisan solution to keep businesses & nonprofits above water during the COVID crisis but of course the @GOP now wants to make exceptions for women’s health care. It’s sad that we are no longer surprised by the politicization of the DOJ.  https://t.co/Y8qXwsOTrU

Don't fall victim to COVID scams. Today @ 11:30 join me & representatives from the FTC IRS and Miami-Dade Police Departments Economic Crimes Division to discuss ways to protect yourself from scammers during the Coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/4ve2qmRoa9

Join us LIVE as we discuss how communities of color have been disproportionately affected by COVID-19. We're highlighting the reasons why communities of color are at greater risk and discussing best practices to stay healthy and safe. https://t.co/XYTMnDSArR
Through the COVID crisis @GovRonDeSantis has displayed a callous indifference and lack of candor.  His lack of transparency will cost lives. We may just never know how many. https://t.co/W0dbvyIFvr

The @USPS is keeping our country moving. We owe a debt of gratitude to the postal workers who bravely serve our communities during the #COVID pandemic.   That's why @HouseDemocrats made sure funding for the Postal Service was a priority in the #Heroes Act. https://t.co/zlBwV0fdnP

Even amid the #coronavirus pandemic we can’t ignore our November election. I’m proud to share that @HouseDemocrats’ #HeroesAct will ensure voters can safely vote and participate in an election where America’s safety hangs in the balance. https://t.co/PSm7R4uce3

Join me now for a Facebook LIVE conversation with Director Jared Moskowitz from the Florida Dept. of Emergency Management for an important update about efforts to mitigate the COVID-19 crisis and preparations for hurricane season. https://t.co/tfPRHVBEI3

In America we have -80000 lives lost -More than 1.3 million confirmed cases -More than 30 million initial unemployment claims Now is not the time to sit back. Congress and the Senate MUST continue to respond to the #COVID crisis and put #FamiliesFirst.  https://t.co/czkGC2qYsQ

Schools may be closed but teachers are working harder than ever. We should appreciate them every day but this #TeacherAppreciationWeek let’s give a special thanks to educators during the #coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/5vqbyIJlLs

.@BetsyDeVosED should be spending her time ensuring students and schools can get through the #COVID pandemic. Instead she’s fighting tooth and nail to empower those accused of sexual misconduct. https://t.co/96xJcBBtno

During the #COVID pandemic it’s easy to fall prey to scams of all kinds. Be wary of anything you find suspicious and remember if something seems too good to be true it probably is. Stay safe. https://t.co/GejfQPgIzY

I’m saddened to learn we’ve lost Donald DiPetrillo Fire Chief to the Seminole Tribe of Florida to COVID-19. He will be remembered for his constant professionalism and commitment to public service. We must protect our first responders as they protect us. https://t.co/kpQjR3GbIu
Need help navigating the #COVID crisis? Tune in to my Telephone Town Hall right now on Facebook Live for the latest info! https://t.co/A2xMeBsR21

The #CARESAct specifically stipulated that all college students qualify for emergency federal aid. Starving DREAMERS of much needed relief during the coronavirus pandemic is not only immoral it’s unauthorized. https://t.co/spH7Fvp0TJ

#Coronavirus and social distancing can’t stop us from staying in touch. Tune  in to my Telephone Town Hall at 7:50 PM tonight on Facebook Live or register here:  https://t.co/koli3MzKfl https://t.co/N66AcEprEA

New PPP loans for small businesses Florida's broken unemployment system DeSantis's weak response to COVID-19 and more were up for discussion when I sat down with @WPLGLocal10's 'This Week in South Florida.' https://t.co/TROkdhwO7w

Yesterday I flew up to DC to vote on more funding for TRULY small businesses health care workers hospitals & a national testing strategy. Dems fought to get these critical issues included in this vital bill. I will continue to fight to keep Floridians safe & healthy! #COVID19 https://t.co/7SRxTiZZi7

.@realDonaldTrump never fails to scapegoat immigrants. Now he's using them to distract from his disastrous #coronavirus response. It will not heal our economy either. Ramping up testing & protecting health care workers will truly keep Americans safe. https://t.co/6KaBGmHM8O
Please join me and @RepRutherfordFL as we talk w/ listeners and @HudsonsView on @WLRN this morning about the ongoing federal response to COVID-19. https://t.co/ccpRJBkABO
#ListenToTheCongressMoms: By staying home you can slow the spread of #Covid_19 and save more lives! https://t.co/VQtCkwPdv9

Normally it's Tax Day. Due to #coronavirus it is not normal times so you don't have to file federal returns by today.  But you can speed up delivery of your Economic Impact Payment. Submit your direct deposit info at this new IRS portal:  https://t.co/37hZyWHnr2

Working men & women face brutal economic conditions in the face of this #coronavirus public health crisis.   That’s why I commit to making sure our government puts #FamiliesFirst now and going forward. https://t.co/XMiGszEULF
#LeadingFromBehind on #coronavirus https://t.co/NOXR91WWvw

After resisting @GovRonDeSantis finally issued a statewide stay-at-home order.   It's overdue riddled w/ loopholes & still leaves many open to #COVID-19.   Days of delay & mixed messages = more viral spread more risks to health workers and more deaths. https://t.co/avQpzrl7Ol

The #COVID19 stimulus bill has $2 Trillion in relief including direct payments to Americans. Call in to my telephone townhall tonight at 7 to get the details. Dial 855-905-3297 or register & watch online here: https://t.co/koli3MzKfl
Do you have question about the #COVID19 stimulus bill? Call in to 855-905-3297 tonight @ 7 to participate in my telephone townhall or register & watch online here: https://t.co/koli3MzKfl
Even in female-dominated professions – many of them on the COVID-19 front lines – it is nurses psychiatric and home health aides and grocery store cashiers who feel this gap. (4/8)

There’s $2 trillion in relief included in the #CARESAct our bipartisan #coronavirus stimulus package with about $377 billion going to small businesses. Here’s a breakdown of the bill that’s focused on businessowners. Stay tuned for more. https://t.co/gtNXCFwDsF
This #NationalDoctorsDay let’s give a heartfelt thank you to those on the #coronavirus front lines.   The best gift: #StayHome #StaySafe https://t.co/8tdlD7FkSG

There’s $2 trillion in relief for families hospitals & small businesses in the #CARESAct our bipartisan #coronavirus stimulus package. I'll break down that $2T investment including direct payments to individuals like you. Here’s my first breakdown. Stay tuned for more. https://t.co/iwprFMUJei

Masks. Face shields. Ventilators. These are the tools our hospitals need to take on the #coronavirus. @HouseDemocrats secured resources in the #CARESAct to help them access all that and more.  https://t.co/fFAPdBknuw

Working men & women face tough times ahead in this public health crisis and brave nurses & doctors need resources to fight #coronavirus. The bipartisan CARES Act puts #FamiliesFirst and provides relief to workers hospitals & small businesses. We are all in this together. https://t.co/SX0V2uOCCt

.@GovRonDeSantis is afraid to lead. Issuing a #StayHome order is surest way to stop spread of #coronavirus before critically ill Floridians overwhelm our hospitals but he refuses.  https://t.co/Ahf90cLKNk

In the cascade of #coronavirus news it's easy to miss important updates. The IRS extended its filing deadline to July 15 giving everyone 3 additional months to file their federal taxes. https://t.co/6uJwLO1ZHj

At my Telephone Town Hall this week respected public health expert Dr. Zeke Emanuel warned that not closing all public beaches in Florida will allow this ‘petri plate’ threat to spread #coronavirus to our elderly population. https://t.co/q66ogw0wz0
We’re live! Watch/call in to my #Coronavirus town hall now at 855-905-3286 or on my website: https://t.co/rAPsU4QxzM

There’s still time to register to participate in today’s #Coronavirus Telephone Townhall. Call 855-905-3287 at 7 PM or register online right now ⬇️⬇️⬇️  https://t.co/koli3MzKfl https://t.co/6wg6AqIBgJ

Today at 7:10 PM I will be hosting a virtual interactive event to discuss Coronavirus (COVID-19) with my constituents. To participate call 855-905-3297 at 7 PM or register here: https://t.co/koli3MzKfl https://t.co/uEQ9RoEiR2

These past days have required a massive local and national response to #Coronavirus. Here is a brief rundown of what I am doing to help address it in Washington and South Florida. https://t.co/Hrg4Zs7ArL

Thank you to all of the nurses doctors and health care workers in #FL23 who continue to selflessly go in and fight the spread of #Coronavirus. You are the heroes we need in this time of crisis. https://t.co/08UFB0B6D3

Some polling places across South Florida have moved in response to the #Coronavirus. You still have time to vote before the polls close but be sure to check if your precinct location has changed. https://t.co/rczWwNUho8

Just last week I heard troubling testimony from NIAID Dir. Dr. Fauci that the US  is “failing” to adequately test for #Coronavirus.   This is taking too long.   HT to @AlexWagner & @SHO_TheCircus for documenting it. https://t.co/xXXoSyQePK

I'm proud to have joined with @HouseDemocrats to deliver the #FamiliesFirst #Coronavirus Response Act.  Americans need a coordinated fully-funded government-wide response to keep us safe from this pandemic https://t.co/jZwUJwJtBT

As the social and economic impacts of #COVID19 mount @HouseDemocrats worked through the night on the #FamiliesFirst #Coronavirus Response Act. I’m proud to have voted to (among other things) ✅Guarantee free testing ✅Establish paid sick leave ✅Expand food assistance

The US distressingly lags globally in #Coronavirus testing at just a fraction of what S. Korea UK Italy & Israel have done.  We need free fast widely available testing to understand and contain #COVID19US.   This administrations keeps failing to lead. https://t.co/ojpZqsMpks

I asked Dr. Fauci @OversightDems about #Coronavirus testing. He said our #COVID19 system is ‘failing.’ This is unacceptable. It’s past time for free testing for everyone who needs it including the uninsured. https://t.co/Rp7xOAVL81

In this #Coronavirus epidemic our 1st responders are more likely to be exposed in the line of duty. I met w/ @WalterIAFF  our District VP of the IAFF alongside firefighters from Miami-Dade to discuss how the federal gov't can help keep 1st responders safe as they keep us safe. https://t.co/utNmcVV8Tr

#Coronavirus makes the case for paid sick leave all the more apparent. Every day we have symptomatic people going to work and spreading disease because they can’t afford not to.  https://t.co/ffRlYdP3Wh
If you are concerned about Coronavirus symptoms:  1. Call the Florida Department of Health in Broward County @FLHealthBroward (866-779-6121)   2. Call your health care provider

This morning @RepTedDeutch and I held a round table with local leaders and health professionals to address the spread of #Coronavirus in Florida. It is critical that we work together to contain and mitigate the disease and present a unified whole-of-government response. https://t.co/F8aYTDG2kv

The $8.3 billion emergency response package passed by @HouseDemocrats will go a long way to address the #Coronavirus epidemic but the single biggest thing we can all do is practice good hygiene and wash your hands regularly. https://t.co/zmVt8V8yye
